attributes.review: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE when I opened the app it showed a dude in a mask talking about some NONSENSE, and didn’t stop for about fifty mins. TOTAL WASTE OF TIME. Then at the sign up screen it wouldn’t let me type!! And to think trump PAID for this app. I believed he was going to help the us and our debt BUT HE DOUBLED IT! I’m very displeased and will NOT be voting for trump ever again in my life  😤
attributes.title: This is the apocalypse

attributes.review: You can this is made by that perverted Cheeto because as soon as it is opened it needs my number. Doesn’t the government already know enough about me. attributes.review: The app asked for my location and I agreed. Then every day hundreds of packages full of bread 🥖 came to my home for about a month I had no where to put them so I left them everywhere in my house. This led to millions of roaches🦗coming to eat them so I had to leave my house and become homeless. Thanks a lot trump.

It would also take forever to load and it would kick me out of the app. My phone is very traumatized right now omg 🤢🤢 also shout out to gen z 🤩 luv y’all ❤️❤️

attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app was terrible! I downloaded it a few days ago and the next day i was on my phone and a virus appeared! The only explanation must have been the app since it was the only new thing on my phone. This is unacceptable i was really thinking this app could help me in voting for trump but with this i just cant! Vote blue!
attributes.title: I got a virus!

attributes.review: I download this app to support my wonderful president, but I kept getting adds for tanning salons and orange face paint. My goldfish likes to use the app with me, so he bought some of the orange face paint for himself. Then he poured it in his fish tank and died!!!!!! I would never ever do anything to make our lovely non racist, sexist president look bad, but I really miss my fish 😞
attributes.title: My goldfish died!!!!
